name: HARRISBURG AUTO AUCTION, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Bureau of Professional and Occupational Affairs, State Board of Vehicle Manufacturers, Dealers and Salespersons, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Commonwealth Court dated November 20, 1996, is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:
